Description.Name: Thor
Description.Details: The Thor was created for the Star League Defense Force in 2680 in response to a need for mobile fire support. Specifications called for a vehicle that could travel at speeds of 80km/h on flat terrain and carry the Thumper Artillery Piece. The SLDF's Quartermaster Command chose the Thor because it was the only submitted design that met the 80km/h specification and due to its advanced CASE protection system, which allowed the crew and vehicle to survive an ammunition explosion. Carrying just seven and a half tons of Ferro-Fibrous armor, the vehicle relies on its speed for protection with only a pair of medium lasers available should an attacker close range.. The vehicle mounts the fifteen ton Thumper Artillery Piece  as it’s main gun with forty rounds of ammunition available. Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 5/8 Hex: 150/240 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 175 30 Left 120 30 Right 120 30 Rear 110 30 Turret 150 30 Total 675 150

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
